get.summary: Get a listing of the favorite news.
get.description: Get a listing of the favorite news

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Change the Default Record Count. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Change the Default Offset of the Query. If not found, 0 will be used.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Category ID if you need favorites for specific category
